body_html: Hey @F3PiX, your season switch PR solves this problem, I think. It does not warp into a future season, but it achieves the desired effect by modifying the current one. Do you think this one can be closed?
body_text: Hey @F3PiX, your season switch PR solves this problem, I think. It does not warp into a future season, but it achieves the desired effect by modifying the current one. Do you think this one can be closed?
body: Hey @F3PiX, your season switch PR solves this problem, I think. It does not warp into a future season, but it achieves the desired effect by modifying the _current_ one. Do you think this one can be closed?
